messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

new map project tuesday pm map hello please find attached repository users invited thanks

message.reasoning:
**Defining the Ticket Type**

I'm currently trying to determine the correct category for this IT ticket. I've analyzed the text and am considering which of the available options best fits the described issue. My initial impression leans towards "Internal Project" due to the mention of a "new map project" and an invitation to users. I need to make sure this fits with other categories if the ticket mentions them, so I'm doing a final check for relevance.


**Finalizing the Categorization**

I've determined that "Internal Project" is the most appropriate category for the IT ticket. My reasoning centers on the "new map project" reference and the mention of a repository, strongly suggesting an internal project environment. The invitation to users further supports this categorization.  While "Access" could be relevant, "Internal Project" encompasses the broader context. This decision considers all the provided options.


**Refining the Rationale**

I've examined the ticket text again and refined my reasoning for selecting "Internal Project". The keywords "new map project" and "repository" are particularly persuasive, signaling work within an internal environment. Furthermore, the mention of "users invited" highlights the collaborative aspect of this project. While access management is implied, "Internal Project" captures the broader context, encompassing both project creation and user involvement. This also means this will be different to existing tickets, and will require new knowledge, this is why I am prioritizing this category.
